spec_data.Name: GtkAda-gnome
spec_data.Description:
GtkAda is an Ada binding to the graphical toolkit GTK+. It allows you to
develop graphical user interfaces in Ada using GTK+.

The GtkAda-gnome package contains the GTKada binding to Gnome's graphical
user interface libraries.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 03:49:10 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GTKada 2 binding to Gnome's GUI libraries
